content:
@WG-prioritization we were having this discussion in another thread - so let's decideit here.

Do you want to be pinged here on every issue being requested?
if yes react with :check: (this is the behaviour we followed all these weeks)
if no react with :cross_mark:

If some people wish to be pinged, we will leave it at that.
Other suggestions are welcome as well
I think it's been helpful getting stuff prioritized but I'm not opposed to turning it off.
I have terrible schedules these days, being pinged helps me hop into an issue when I have a moment
alright, it seems like we want the pings then :)
btw, you may have realized that I don't follow the process really in an async way
I meant, I mainly set some time apart and go over all the pending stuff at once
I find that more productive for me :)
anyway feel free to ping me on things I could be of help
